com.groupon.mapreduce.mongo
Class JobUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.groupon.mapreduce.mongo.JobUtil

public class JobUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This is a class of static utility functions which can be accessed in a MapReduce job.

JobUtil

public JobUtil()
Method Detail

get

public static java.util.List get(java.util.Map map,
                                 java.lang.String path)
Given a Map, fetch fields with a JSONPath-like dot syntax. Example: JobUtil.get(map, "key1.key2")

Parameters:
map - Map from which to fetch values.
path - JSONPath-like dot-delimited path within the map.
Returns:
Values found, this is always a list because if the path includes an array, then the remaining path is applied to each element of the array, thus there is the potential for multiple results.
